Used to request a taxpayer identification number (TIN) for reporting on an information return the amount paid.

LayoutNode.Content: Form 941
LayoutNode.SRC: Form 941

LayoutNode.Content: Employer's Quarterly Federal Tax Return. Employers who withhold income taxes, social security tax, or Medicare tax from employee's paychecks or who must pay the employer's portion of social security or Medicare tax. Form 941 Related: Instructions for Form 941
LayoutNode.SRC: Employer's Quarterly Federal Tax Return.Employers who withhold income taxes, social security tax, or Medicare tax from employee's paychecks or who must pay the employer's portion of social security or Medicare tax.Form 941Related:Instructions for Form 941

LayoutNode.Content: Form SS-4
LayoutNode.SRC: Form SS-4

LayoutNode.Content: Application for Employer Identification Number (EIN) Use this form to apply for an employer identification number (EIN). Form SS-4 Related: Instructions for Form SS-4
LayoutNode.SRC: Application for Employer Identification Number (EIN)Use this form to apply for an employer identification number (EIN).Form SS-4Related:Instructions for Form SS-4

LayoutNode.Content: Form W-4
LayoutNode.SRC: Form W-4

LayoutNode.Content: Employee's Withholding Allowance Certificate. Complete Form W-4 so that your employer can withhold the correct federal income tax from your pay. Form W-4 Related: Withholding Calculator
LayoutNode.SRC: Employee's Withholding Allowance Certificate.Complete Form W-4 so that your employer can withhold the correct federal income tax from your pay.Form W-4Related:Withholding Calculator

LayoutNode.Content: Form W-2
LayoutNode.SRC: Form W-2

LayoutNode.Content: Wage and Tax Statement. Employers must file a Form W-2 for each employee from whom Income, social security, or Medicare tax was withheld. Form W-2 Related : General Instructions for Forms W-2 and W-3
LayoutNode.SRC: Wage and Tax Statement.Employers must file a Form W-2 for each employee from whom Income, social security, or Medicare tax was withheld.Form W-2Related:General Instructions for Forms W-2 and W-3

LayoutNode.Content: Form W-7
LayoutNode.SRC: Form W-7

LayoutNode.Content: Application for IRS Individual Taxpayer Identification Number. Get or renew an individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN) for federal tax purposes if you are not eligible for a social security number.
LayoutNode.SRC: Application for IRS Individual Taxpayer Identification Number.Get or renew an individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN) for federal tax purposes if you are not eligible for a socialsecurity number.

LayoutNode.Content: Form 4506-T
LayoutNode.SRC: Form 4506-T

LayoutNode.Content: Request for Transcript of Tax Return Use this form to order a transcript or other return information free of charge, or designate a third party to receive the information. Form 4506-T Related: Form 4506 Form 2848
LayoutNode.SRC: Request for Transcript of Tax ReturnUse this form to order a transcript or other return information free of charge, or designate a third party to receive the information.Form 4506-TRelated: Form 4506Form 2848

LayoutNode.Content: Form 9465
LayoutNode.SRC: Form 9465

LayoutNode.Content: Installment Agreement Request Use this form to request a monthly installment plan if you cannot pay the full amount you owe shown on your tax return (or on a notice we sent you). Form 9465 Related: Instructions for Form 9465
LayoutNode.SRC: Installment Agreement RequestUse this form to request a monthly installment plan if you cannot pay the full amount you owe shown on your tax return (or on a notice we sent you).Form 9465Related:Instructions for Form 9465
